Package halo.userinterface.gui.guitools

Provides a set of tools corresponding to the graphical user interface.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutDialog Displays a dialog with information about HALO
DisplayWarnings Shows warning and error dialogs with a given text message
GuiTools Class containing several tools used for Graphical User Interface
HelpButton Provides a button that displays a help dialog upon clicking.
InputHelpDialog Displays a dialog with a message, a text field for user input, a help button and Enter/Cancel buttons
JPEGFilter File filter that accepts only jpg files
LabelChooserDialog Provides a new dialog window that displays a list of components and adds scroll bars if necessary
TxtFilter File filter that accepts only text files
 

Package halo.userinterface.gui.guitools Description

Provides a set of tools corresponding to the graphical user interface.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • HALO documentation
